page.title: 18SUSHIONS MANOR.
page.content: We went down to the old airfield and walked across the fields using the old runway roads.We passed a pond called the Rookery and walked along side the canal. We cut across the fields of wheat and hay and ended up at a large farm house called Sushions Manor.It was built in the early 18th century.The house was built with bricks and stone. It had red and black tiles.On the farm they had some cows with their young and a bull. When the house was built some monks lived there.When the monks lived there, there was a bell.The bell was used to call the workers on the farm to stop work.At the farm was a duck pond.We saw some fields of rape,barley and potatoes.The farmer said the house had been in the family all the time.
